tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE packaging_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    packaging_type VARCHAR(50),
    packaging_material VARCHAR(50),
    safety_standard VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE packaging_specifications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  package_type VARCHAR(50),
  package_material VARCHAR(50),
  package_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE safety_standards (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  product_category VARCHAR(50),
  safety_rating INT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  submitted_by VARCHAR(100),
  packaging_id INT,
  safety_standard_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_specifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    packaging_material VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    weight DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    remarks TEXT,
    is_compliant BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT NOT NULL,
    inspector_id INT NOT NULL,
    inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_specifications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  package_weight DECIMAL(10,2),
  package_dimensions VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturing_date DATE
);
